name: wrdsymbcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c2, (0[..^](# ` c0)), c0, c1, c0 ∈ Word(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))

comment: A symbol within a word over an alphabet belongs to the alphabet. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Jun-2018.)
